name: Less Hope Time Limit
description:
Less Hope Time LimitBackstory :

Year A.W. 346, some soldiers are stationed at TECH planet.

One day, the alien's army attacked the human's headquarters.

They want to occupy this planet, so they attack the base of humans very hard.

At that time, the soldier army sent a remote-control lancer robot to delay the enemies for the civilian spaceship to escape successfully.

How to Play :

PLAYER must defeat enemies until the time runs out.

If PLAYER gets attacked or touched by the enemy, the player will lose immediately.

If PLAYER defeats more enemies, you will get weapon upgrade options.

Controller :

W, A, S, D - Moving

Spacebar - Fly

Left Mouse Click - Shoot (The enemies & The obstacles)

1, 2, 3 - Upgrade Weapons (Choose one only)
